item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Trend Continues, with CEX Net Outflow of 134,900 ETH in the Past 24 Hours
item.description: On August 29th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net outflow of ETH from CEXs was 134,900 ETH. The top three exchanges with the largest outflows are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 113,700 ETH;· Bybit, with an outflow of 27,800 ETH;· Bithumb, with an outflow of 3,123.70 ETH.In addition, OKX witnessed an inflow of 5,594.47 ETH and ranked first in the inflow list.

item.title: Influencer @0xSunNFT spent 30 $ETH($133.8K) to buy 807,301 $Block today.
item.description: Influencer @0xSunNFT spent 30 $ETH($133.8K) to buy 807,301 $Block today. 0xSun once made over $24M in profit from $TRUMP.

item.title: Mantle×Bybit Roadmap Released, MNT Utility Upgraded Across the Board
item.description: August 29th, today. Bybit officially launched the "Mantle × Bybit Roadmap" plan. MNT will be able to support payment platform transaction fees and obtain discounts, with a comprehensive upgrade in multi-scenario utility:Transaction Fee Discount: MNT will gradually support the payment of transaction fees for spot and linear contract products. Users using MNT for settlement will enjoy exclusive fee rate discounts.Multi-Scenario Application: Centering around the four major paths of Buy / Use / Earn / Hold, MNT will gradually be implemented in trading, wealth management, payment, and equity scenarios.Dual-line Empowerment: For institutional and retail users, Bybit will introduce mechanisms such as position thresholds, loan and collateral optimization, and membership benefits to support long-term holding and active trading.Launch Progress: Core functions will be rolled out in batches starting from this quarter, and more details will be announced through subsequent announcements and

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $110,000
item.description: On August 29th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin experienced a rebound and reached above $110,000. The 24-hour decline was narrowed to 2.59%.

item.title: LEVER Short-Term Surge Exceeds 120%, Market Cap Rises to $9.28 Million
item.description: On August 29th, possibly due to the influence of the "Binance to Delist LEVERUSDT Perpetual Contract" news, LEVER experienced a short-term surge of more than 120%, and its market value reached $9.28 million.

item.title: Binance Will Delist the LEVERUSDT Perpetual Contract
item.description: On August 29th, Binance Futures will remove the USD?-M LEVERUSDT perpetual contract from its platform.

item.title: Bybit Web3 is now live with The Bitcoin Mascot (BITTY), and trading is now open.
item.description: August 29th. Bybit Web3 has launched The Bitcoin Mascot (BITTY) today and it is now available for trading. Users can directly trade using USDT, USDC, SOL, or BBSOL without the requirement of a wallet or Gas, and can enjoy a fast and seamless on-chain asset experience.Update your Bybit APP to version 5.0.0 or higher to commence your seamless Web3 journey right away.

item.title: Gate has now listed Dexlab (XLAB) for spot trading.
item.description: On August 29th, as per an official announcement, Gate initiated Dexlab (XLAB) spot trading on the same day.

item.title: Huobi HTX has launched CRO perpetual contracts and kicked off a contract trading party.
item.description: August 29th. As per an official announcement, Huobi HTX launched the CRO/USDT perpetual contract on August 29th, featuring a maximum leverage of 10x. Meanwhile, from August 29th at 17:30 to September 5th at 17:30 (in UTC+8 time zone), Huobi HTX has initiated a CRO contract trading party with a total prize pool of up to $10,000.During this event, users who sign up and engage in CRO/USDT contract trading, with a cumulative valid trading volume ≥$10,000 USDT, will be eligible to share the prize pool according to their trading volume ranking; new contract users participating in CRO/USDT contract trading will also receive exclusive benefits.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Official Economic Data On-chain, Oracle Race Welcomes New Opportunities
item.description: August 29th: The Department of Commerce of the United States announced that starting from 2025, quarterly GDP data will be published on 9 public blockchains such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana, etc., and disseminated through Chainlink and the Pyth Network, achieving the first-ever on-chain macroeconomic data. In response to this news, the PYTH token surged by more than 100%, while the LINK token saw a short-term increase of nearly 5%.BiyaPay analysts pointed out that this will enhance data transparency and inject new energy into RWA and DeFi innovation, and the oracle track is expected to develop rapidly.The BiyaPay multi-asset trading wallet will continue to provide users with one-stop services such as global remittances, cryptocurrency trading, and U.S. and Hong Kong stock investments, helping investors remain agile in complex markets.
